short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Infinite Mario Game from openhtml5games converted and hosted by Eden Urias. This version contains sound.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Infinite Mario is a game made by Notch (creator of Minecraft) and was written in java. openhtml5games currently hosts an html5 version of the game that will run in the browser. This extension hosts the game as an extension that, when clicked, will popup with a small temporary window where you can play the game. (https://developer.chrome.com/docs/extensions/reference/browserAction/)

Conrols:
-S to start
-Arrow keys to move in map screen
-S to select level
-S to Jump in game
-Left and Right Arrows to Move in game.
-A to Sprint in game
-A to shoot fireballs in game.

Please note:
Once you click out of the game window, you will lose all of your progress.








Having trouble getting caught playing this in class?
Shhhh... Lemme tell you a secret:
Install ninja mode here: (https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/infinite-mario-ninja-mode/cgedmffdlkchgklhodbmgljhjagfmoaf?hl=en&authuser=0)
Ninja mode has muted game audio and optimized controls for the utmost secrecy.
